changeSet.author: Grigorovich
changeSet.sql: create table spare_part ( spare_part_id int auto_increment, spare_part_name_part varchar(50), spare_part_brand varchar(50), spare_part_coast varchar(50), work_list_id int, constraint spare_part_pk primary key (spare_part_id), constraint spare_part_work_list_fk foreign key (work_list_id) references work_list (work_list_id) ON DELETE SET NULL );
